command: ffuf -se -t 40 -fc 404 -maxtime 7200 -rate 400 -v -timeout 20 -H "User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:109.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/117.0" -w _wordlist_ -u "_target_/FUZZ" -o $(echo _target_ | unfurl domains).json -od $(echo _target_ | unfurl domains) -of json ; if [ -f $(echo _target_ | unfurl domains).json ]; then ffufPostprocessing -result-file $(echo _target_ | unfurl domains).json -bodies-folder $(echo _target_ | unfurl domains) -delete-bodies -overwrite-result-file ; sudo rm -r $(echo _target_ | unfurl domains) ; jq -r ".. | .url? // empty" $(echo _target_ | unfurl domains).json | tee -a output ; go clean -cache -modcache ; sudo rm $(echo _target_ | unfurl domains).json ; fi ; if [ -d /tmp ]; then sudo rm -rf /tmp/* ; fi
